name: PengWings
description:
*Please note that, while Pengwings was designed for tablets, it will run fine on phones, albeit at a smaller resolution.*

A long, long time ago, there was a penguin who couldn't swim.
All the other penguins could swim, and he didn't know what to do...

So, because of this, he created The Legendary Pengwings.
 These allowed him to fly, something no other penguin could do...

The Legendary Pengwings were passed down from generation to generation...

Until today, where it reached a little penguin,  looking for his long lost love...
